name: PP
description:
"Butt" is in a hurry to go to the toilet, the road to the toilet is difficult, "fast food" is your enemy, all "fast food" will make you jet!
Find the toilet paper and the toilet bowl to advance to the next level. Complex terrain may require some skill.



In-game graphics, music, and programming
The graphics, music, and programming in the game were created by a bilibili UP site owner - Crow Man - over the course of a month.
